item.description:
We're finally there! We will hike the last 5 miles of the MA Appalachian Trail....and then we'll do the first 3 of the Vermont trail as well. Fair warning, the trail head 3 miles into Vermont at County rd may be difficult to get to...it is a dirt road and is in better condition some years then others. So we will do our best to meet at that trail head for car spotting back to Pattison rd (the ending location of hike 9). If it proves too treacherous, then we will just do an out and back from Pattison rd to the VT border and back. So assuming we have no problems, the hike should be around 8 miles and 1600 ft elevation gain. If we have to do the out and back then it will be a 10 mile hike with the same 1600 ft elevation gain, but with an additional 1600 ft elevation loss. I will attempt to get up there a little early and call people if we need to meet at Pattison rd instead of County rd.




Is This Hike for Me?

This is a pretty short hike with moderate elevation gain. We'll be moving at a slow to moderate pace. If you've come this far, you wont have trouble with this last section! Please bring plenty of water (I'm bringing 3 liters) appropriate hiking attire (no jeans or cotton, hiking boots not sneakers), rain gear in case the weather turns nasty, lunch, and snacks.

 

Trail Route Information:
(Starting from Pattison rd in North Adams, MA)

0.9 mi. to Rt 2

1.8 mi. to Sherman brook campsite

1.5 mi. to Eph's lookout

0.8 mi. to Vermont border

3.0 mi. to County rd


 

 


Trailhead Directions:

From Providence 3 hours 10 minutes

Take route 8 in North Adams over the Vermont border. Turn left on Mill st, follow for 1.8 miles. Turn left on County rd, follow for 2.8 miles to the trail head.

Google Map:
https://maps.google.com/maps?q=42.775952,-73.135911&hl=en&ll=42.77559,-73.134173&spn=0.006812,0.013937&sll=37.0625,-95.677068&sspn=59.249168,114.169922&t=h&z=17

Coordinates: 42.775952,-73.135911


Carpool Option:

Please use the comments section to coordinate with other hikers if you want to carpool.

Liability Waiver:
As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com; the leader(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you for yourself, your heirs, executors, and administrators release, hold harmless, and indemnify the leader(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.
item.how_to_find_us: Take rt 8 into Vermont, left on Mill st for 1.8 miles, left on County rd for 2.8 miles. Read more below! My Cell: 860-460-1500
item.name: Massachusetts Appalachian Trail: Part 10 THE END!
